title: SUBLIME Material Watch Face
summary: Interactive Material Watch Face for All Android Wear

Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose SUBLIME Material Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
EF-D20

Category
Material

SUBLIME Watch Face is a Material watch face for all smart watches, a Interactive Touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).

it has following features

 Interactive Touch
 Night Mode
 Date,Day,Month
 12 & 24 hour time format
 5 Colorful Default Ambient Modes
 Ambient Mode with Unlimited Colors
 square & round watches support


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!

Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/b/102084729733615241293


It has following features

INTERACTIVE TOUCH INCLUDE:
 Switch Between 12H & 24H
 Change Different Colors
 Turn On / Off Interactive Touch

Features:

 Interactive Touch
 Night Mode
 Date,Day,Month
 12 & 24 hour time format
 5 Colorful Default Ambient Modes
 Ambient Mode with Unlimited Colors
 square & round watches support
Configuration:
 Turn On / Off Interactive Touch
 Turn On / Off Night Mode
 Pick Your Favorite Ambient Mode
 Pick Your Favorite Ambient Mode Color
 Switch between 12 hour & 24 hour Format
 Pick Your Favorite Color Theme



For Email support Contact us at elitewatchface@gmail.com

Tip 1
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose SUBLIME Material Watch Face as your watch face

Note


Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: Night mode doesn't work... Night mode doesn't work, screen goes black after showing night mode for a second ...
perfact cool Amazing Colors that looks beautiful must download it
Full of colours Awesome watchface with very lively colours.
